title.rendered: Inns of Monterey Announce Summertime Savings

content.rendered:
MONTEREY, Calif., June 6, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Summertime in Monterey is pure splendor. Experiences and adventures abound on the waters of Monterey Bay and throughout the county, and the area buzzes with events, outdoor activities, parades, farmer’s markets, and festivals celebrating Central California’s culture and culinary spirit. Indulge your curiosity and exploration of what the area offers, like shopping on Cannery Row, experiencing the awe-inspiring marine life at Monterey Bay Aquarium, or indulging in the area’s many area restaurants and wine-tasting rooms. Just as each of the Inns of Monterey has its individual personality, a unique summertime special is available at Casa Munras Garden Hotel & Spa, Monterey Bay Inn, Spindrift Inn, Wave Street Inn, and Victorian Inn.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/inns-of-monterey-announce-summertime-savings-302166593.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
